function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced visitation to parks and urban green spaces due to legal restrictions on access","Impact":"Decreased access to green spaces could lead to negative impacts on mental and physical health, as well as reduced social interaction","Mitigation":"Implement measures to ensure safe access to green spaces, promote alternative outdoor activities, and provide support for virtual social interaction","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, mobile apps for outdoor activities, crowd management systems","People":"General public, especially those in urban areas","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Dichotomy in access to green spaces resulting in localized or long-distance travel","Impact":"Increased travel may lead to environmental implications such as higher carbon emissions and resource consumption","Mitigation":"Promote and develop localized green spaces, encourage sustainable travel options, and implement measures to reduce the need for long-distance travel for green space access","Technologies":"Green space mapping and planning tools, sustainable transportation infrastructure, urban design for localized green spaces","People":"Urban residents, environmental advocacy groups","Owner":"Urban planners, transportation authorities, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Reduction in use of private cars and increase in pedestrian traffic for reaching green spaces","Impact":"Changes in transportation modes may affect traffic patterns, pedestrian safety, and air quality in urban areas","Mitigation":"Invest in pedestrian-friendly infrastructure, promote alternative transportation modes, and manage traffic to ensure safety and efficiency","Technologies":"Smart traffic management systems, pedestrian safety measures, sustainable urban transportation planning","People":"Pedestrians, cyclists, drivers","Owner":"Transportation authorities, urban planners, local governments"}]}
